title: Collalto 2020 Brut San Salvatore  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
description: Creamy and fragrant, this offers aromas of honeysuckle, citrus and ripe orchard fruit. On the bright palate, vibrant acidity and a foaming perlage accompany white peach, green melon and Granny Smith apple.

title: Dark Horse 2019 Merlot (California)
description: A flinty character dominates this otherwise smooth and polished wine. Aromas of tobacco and wood char lead to herb-tinged black-cherry and black-currant flavors as light tannins add a bit of texture to the mouthfeel.

title: La Jara NV Frizzante  (Prosecco)
description: Made with organically grown grapes, this fizzy wine has aromas of white and yellow field flowers and almond. The dry, tangy palate offers ripe pear, yellow apple and lemon zest alongside bright acidity.

title: Simple Life 2019 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description: This rich and densely packed wine is delicious and verges on sweetness. It shows ripe blackberries, strawberries and milk chocolate flavors on a lightly tannic and broad texture.

title: Parras Wines 2020 Alfacinha Reserva Red (Lisboa)
description: Light oak aging has given this wine extra richness, spice and light tannins. It is balanced with richness, plenty of berry fruits and a vanilla aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Columbia Crest 2018 Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: The aromas bring notes of cigar box, spice, tar and cherry. The dark chocolate flavors are supple, painting around the edges initially, with the tannins giving a light grip. It's a lot of wine for the money.
